SELECT _subject.id, _subject.name, FROM budget_subject AS _subject INNER JOIN budget_unit_subject AS _unit_subject ON _unit_subject.subjectid = _subject.id INNER JOIN budget_unit AS _unit ON _unit_subject.unitid = _unit.id AND _unit.yearid = _subject.yearid WHERE _subject.leafflag = 1 AND _subject.costsplitflag = 1 AND _unit.id = #{budgetUnitId} AND (_unit.id , _subject.id) NOT IN (select _agent.unitid , _agent.subjectid FROM budget_year_agent _agent WHERE _unit.id = #{budgetUnitId})

SELECT DISTINCT if(length(bus.formula) > 0, bus.formula, bs.formula) AS formula, if(length(bus.revenueformula) > 0, bus.revenueformula, u.revenueformula) AS revenueformula, if(length(bus.preccratioformula) > 0, bus.preccratioformula, u.preccratioformula) AS preccratioformula, if(length(bus.ccratioformula) > 0, bus.ccratioformula, u.ccratioformula) AS ccratioformula, bs.id, bs.parentid, bs.leafflag, bs.formulaorderno, bs.upsumflag FROM budget_subject AS bs INNER JOIN budget_unit_subject AS bus ON bus.subjectid = bs.id INNER JOIN budget_unit AS u ON bus.unitid = u.id WHERE bs.yearid = #{yearId} AND (u.id = #{budgetUnitId} or u.parentid = #{budgetUnitId})

and budget_unit.id = #{map.budgetUnitId}
